name: Bolt Strength Leg Extension & Leg Curl
description: The Bolt Leg Extension and Leg Curl Machine This equipment is ideal for targeting two major muscle groups: quadriceps and hamstrings. It also allows for a quick and easy transition between these two groups. This allows the user to make the most of their time in the gym by not needing to switch machines between sessions. Leg extensions and hamstring curls are two of the most common muscle-building leg workouts performed with this versatile piece of equipment. Leg extension is an important action for developing your quadriceps and patellar ligament.

name: Tri Grip Iron Weight Plates
description: Tri Grip Plates are high-performance muscle-building plates that can be used to supplement your current muscle-building practice. The unique 'easy grip' feature of the Tri Grip Plate comprises of three hand slots evenly spaced around the plate. They also aid in the appropriate distribution of weight. This ensures that your time is spent exercising rather than putting together equipment. Individually, the Trip Grip Weight Plates can be utilized for overhead lifts and tricep training. They can be used in conjunction with an Olympic Bar as well.

name: Reebok Deck
description: Decks by Reebok are a high-end workout platform that can be reconfigured into a variety of postures. When it comes to aerobics steps, Reebok is the undisputed king, and the Deck steps demonstrate why. It's a high-quality item with a two-year manufacturer warranty. The Deck can be used in a variety of ways, including as a flat bench, a step, and a seat. As a result, the seat can be used for a range of exercises. The deck itself is 12kg, ensuring that it is not only robust but also non-slip during your workout. The maximum load capacity is 110 kg (242lb).
